translated: Mellin, Gustaf Ragniar, agronomist, Resiteröd, born on November 20, 1903, in Uddevalla parish, Älvsborg county. Parents: Albert M. and Agnes Bachman. Married to Majiken Blomér. Children: Nills Gustav, born in 1936, Barbro, born in 1940. Completed high school in 1922, studied agronomy at Uppsala University from 1924 to 1927. Owner and operator of Ödtsmåtli's farm and L:a ToOleröd in Forshälla, Älvsborg county. Chairman of the district association in Bohuslän and northern Älvsborg county from 1938, in Forshälla's agricultural and rural development association from 1941, member of the board of Uddevalla's farming association from 1936, member of the board and vice chairman of the insurance association for fire and livestock in Bohuslän from 1944, member of the board of Uddevalla's savings bank from 1936, member and chairman of the insurance association for agricultural cooperatives in Gothenburg and Bohuslän county 1 from 1945, member of the board of the Gothenburg and Bohuslän county agricultural and rural development association from 1944, member of the county council board from 1942, trustee in the Sparbanken AB (savings bank) in Bohuslän from 1946, member of the board of the Gothenburg fire insurance company since 1945, board member of the Gothenburg and Bohuslän county agricultural association from 1946.
